content.data: The arrows contacting the armours will be discharged and in this war, the gods and demons will all confront one another, there will be showers of lances and arrows and the warriors will strike shouting “kill, kill” from their months.308.
ਮੂੰਹ ਤੋਂ 'ਮਾਰੋ' 'ਮਾਰੋ' ਲਲਕਾਰ ਕੇ (ਸ਼ਸਤ੍ਰਾਂ ਦਾ) ਪ੍ਰਹਾਰ ਕਰਨਗੇ ॥੩੦੮॥
